issue.title: Allow gzclient window to be made smaller

content.raw: Saving the gui configurations sounds good, but the minimum size of the window is still pretty large due to the minimum width of the time panel under the main 3D view and the minimum width of the left and right panels. It'd be great if the window could be made smaller.
